snippet.title: Secrets of the Dark: Temple of Night
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/MV4Yf7
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1mstNLW

Your friend has gotten involved with dark forces and needs your help. Save them in this challenging Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

• A TOWN TRANSFORMS IN DARKNESS
With the change of light and dark, comes a full change to the landscape. Journey between the two to solve the mysteries within!

• STOP A DARK RITUAL!
After getting involved with a story involving the dark forces, your friend is kidnapped by three dark priests who are looking to sacrifice him!

• ILLUMINATE THE ANSWERS
Jump in to this incredible gameplay, solving puzzles to reveal the mysteries of the temple! Stop the Demon of Darkness from gaining limitless power.

• UNLOCK THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION TO ACCESS GREAT BONUSES!
Explore through two separate bonus games that add to this fantastic plot and then enjoy the wonderful wallpapers and integrated strategy guide.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
